website_summaries.verdict: A good middle-of-the-road solution to add an audio system to the handlebars of an ATV.
pros: Multi-vehicle compatibility includes ATVs, motorcycles, and snowmobiles
Hard shell construction makes the speakers weatherproof
Chrome finish adds some visual flair to the exterior of an ATV
Comes with a built-in FM radio
cons: The chrome exterior quickly tarnishes from dirt, mud, and weather

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy. Poor customer service from Pyle.
customer_reviews.text: No support for replacement parts. I need a replacement power cord and have emailed several times only to be ignored. Wasn't asking for anything free. I made it clear I would pay and they still continued to give me the run around. They actually told me to send them a picture of the part I lost. Idiots. I lost it, how am I supposed to take a picture of it. Extremely displeased. I believe I will just buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Robert McCully

customer_reviews.title: Not Powerful Enough
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of reading up before buying this item. I love the finish and features of this unit and it installed very easily. I put it on my 2004 Yamaha 1100 V Star with aftermarket pipes. The sound is as tinny as I expected, guess I was hoping for more. It was fine for a few weeks around town but at highway speeds it was just annoying. I removed and will try to sell on CL.
customer_reviews.author: James P Relich

customer_reviews.title: Loud, Easy to Install, Maximum volume sounds kinda bad
customer_reviews.text: Only bad thing is that when you crank it up to max volume the quality goes down, but its still extremely loud when its 75%. very easy to install, good long wires, you can hook it directly to your battery. The Fm radio isn't changing though
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit knowing that for what I was paying I couldn't expect too much. I was pleasantly surprised by the sound and volume. Excellent amp and speakers were better than expected. Only two things that I found were unacceptable. The unit would not operate mounted on my fairing. turns out that even a small amount of vibration will not allow the amp to operate. Mounted the unit in my saddlebag and it worked flawlessly. this left me with the dillema of the remote that does not work correctly. cannot use it to adjust the volume in any mode.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Works great, had my bike 15 years now
customer_reviews.text: Works great, had my bike 15 years now, and music makes the ride way better. Mtg system sucks it will never fit stock bars, so I modified brackets to mount to my fairing.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Heinrich

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works better then the Shark 250w I had plus can change songs and stations. Just wish you could turn it on from the remote but unit works good and plays MP3's clear as a bell......
customer_reviews.author: chance

customer_reviews.title: water proof ?
customer_reviews.text: the speakers are waterproof but we just had some resent light rain in florida and the system still working but there was water in the led screen and the system wont power down other than that it sounds great i reordered another one to replace the one with water in it and i'm installing a over lay cover which i;ve made to provent water from getting in the system
customer_reviews.author: avery foster

customer_reviews.title: terrible stereo
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my motorcycle, because I saw them at a local bike show and they sounded great. Problem is I have loud pies and you cant hear it. You have to turn it up so loud that it distorts. I was told that wouldnt be a problem. Also the radio fades in and out all the time and doesnt lock on local stations. Very distracting and annoying. I wouldnt recommend these at all ans am trying to return them with no avail..
customer_reviews.author: caseymour

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on my motorcycle in about 30 minutes. Very easy to install and looks and sounds great. It is very loud and I am able to hear it just fine while travelling 75 mph on the intestate.
customer_reviews.author: Gary O

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Disappointment abounds. The USB port doesn't work at all, the remote is lame, not being able to turn on with remote is just pathetic. Get what you pay for....
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Good system
customer_reviews.text: Speakers were larger than I anticipated which is a good thing for me as larger usualy means more bass and beter sound. Do not like the fact that the volume control does not work with the aux cord. One of the Phones I was using as a player was turned as quiet as it could go and the system was still way to loud. Works ok with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Plye PLMCA40 Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Installation was pretty easy. I tried the USB memory stick, it didn't work to well. I bought a 16g sims card, and it's working wonderfully. The quality of the music is great.The remote is questionable, (When u volume up or down it might change tracks, or it might not. Just depends on what it wants to do). But overall it's a great unit for the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr.P

customer_reviews.title: buy it well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Great product second I've purchased. Bass is poor but middle and treble are good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good Tunes
customer_reviews.text: The Pyle PLMCA40 sound system mounted easily and provides good sound as described. I would recomend this unit to anyone seeking an affordable sound system for their bike. I especially love the USB port. My tunes are saved on a memory stick that goes with me every time I ride.
customer_reviews.author: D P

customer_reviews.title: good ahipping,  poor product
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. Product is very substandard. Inputs sd slot and external player both have issues. Large amounts of feedback with external player, sd slot will not secure sd card in place. Sound quality is ok for cheapo system. But to hear it well at 60 mph, to much distortion with required volume. No issues with seller. Product was dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: headcase

customer_reviews.title: Pyle  is a pile!
customer_reviews.text: very poor customer service, called 4 times, left messages because the FM reception is so poor it is unuseable.Still,I have not been able to get ahold of them. Hooking up was not to bad, poor directions, the sound using a MP3 player is good to about 85mph. I would reconmend spending the extra money and getting a quality system, Keep this in mind Pyle is a pile of dung.
customer_reviews.author: royal star v4

customer_reviews.title: This was ok for the first month but when we ...
customer_reviews.text: This was ok for the first month but when we use it now it over heats and cant play for long. The chrome on the speakers are flaking off. The bike is keeped in carport and out of the weather. The system is not used that much. I am sorry I spent the $85 on this.
customer_reviews.author: Kimm Minton

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. Plenty loud for for bkie with loud pipes. Suggestion for product would be to the remote able to power 'on' the device, it will power it off. I'm mounting the unit in the saddlebag for longer rides, so turning power on befor taking off is not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: had to send it back the some day I receive the system it was playing fine before sound stop coming from speaker had to send it back and I had to paying shipping they tell me they have to fix it I can't get a new one
customer_reviews.author: edward pierce

customer_reviews.title: Pyle 300 watt bike radio
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for a country cruise, but if you are on the highway doing 70 you really can't hear it and my bike has a windshield too, but I guess that is to be expected though with all the noise. I would recommend it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chanda Seal

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This system was rather easy to install and works well the sound is great and easily heard even at hiway speeds
customer_reviews.author: Lori Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Sounds awesome except...
customer_reviews.text: The remote control is not very user friendly, impossible to opperate while going down the road so you better hope you have the volume exactly where you need it. But other than that its wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Young

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: For the price couldn't go wrong sound good and was surprised that the phone will interrupt when you get a call and come over your speakers
customer_reviews.author: Jim Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It definitely does not seem to be "weatherproof". It quit playing when I washed it off with a water hose, but worked again after it dried out, but for the money the sound is good.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: put these on my 2007 seadoo rpx put 200 songs on my sd card off I go to river excellent easy to install sound great and loud
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Good solution for dune buggy
customer_reviews.text: I installed it in my dune buggy. Easy install, loud enough and sounds good. At this price it's hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Porter

customer_reviews.title: gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Loud sounds. Only bad thing is if u leave the radio on for a long time it will switch to aux by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Yanni

customer_reviews.title: The remote control is not good ... volume and select is on the same button. NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.text: The volume and selection of song should not be on the same button .. Hard to adjust the volume and it keeps changing the song.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but....
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from this system. Easy hook-up and use. Remote works great. Speakers were larger than anticipated but I was able to find suitable placement on my 02 HD Heritage Softail. Recently downloaded music to USB memory stick from CD's but it will not play in this system. Not sure if I need to format stick or if PLMCA40 screwed up. Plays fine through laptop and desktop computer. PLMCA40 Instructions say to plug in and will start playing automatically but this has yet to happen. Still investigating.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Froggett

customer_reviews.title: Speakers are too big
customer_reviews.text: I purchasedbthis item for my husband's Harley Heritage Classic. I had seen another rider with a set by this same manufacturer. This set has very large, plastic speakers that are far too large for a motorcycle, snowmobile or ATV, as advertised...very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Smullis

customer_reviews.title: Product did not last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this system for my son, and within a week, only one speaker worked. Switched the speaker wire to the other output, and it worked, so it was the acual radio, not the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: LESLIE MARSHALL

customer_reviews.title: Don't like
customer_reviews.text: It don't work half the time. The radio part don't work half the time. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Moon

customer_reviews.title: Much to be desired
customer_reviews.text: This system is far too bulky. The sound is distorted when you turn up the volume. I don't recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: harley-knight

customer_reviews.title: Great Stereo for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I have installed this unit on several motorcycles and haven't had a single complaint. The sound is good, all the features are great and the speakers look good. The FM radio works great and picks up all the local radio stations perfectly. The only thing Pyle could do to make this unit better would be to be able to turn it on with the remote. Mode, volume, mute, and changing channels or bumping to the next song works great.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon H Bellinger Jr

customer_reviews.title: Defective, Returned for a refund
customer_reviews.text: One speak didn't work out if the box, they wanted us to uninstall the entire system instead of just replacing the speaker. So my husband decided if he had to completely uninstall it he might as well just send it back for a refund. He had it installed on his motorcycle. So in short. Bad customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Still working great
customer_reviews.text: I got this system for my 49cc moped and had to mount it in an unusual way because it couldnt be on the handle bars (no room to mount to) but it works great has been in the weather quite a few times bus still goes as stong and loud as when i first got it....my only complaint is that the remote function buttons lables are wearing off and the remote doesnt turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: crazykai

customer_reviews.title: Water Proof or Not?
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and although they are widely used on motorcycles I used them on my jet ski's. One works fantastic and the other took water damage. They are supposed to be water proof. I guess one is and one isn't?
customer_reviews.author: William G Pliler II

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good sounding stereo for the money. Wish it had some kind of bass control. Controls leave a lot to be desired. A remote volume control for the handlebars would have been a plus. Regardless, not a bad purchase for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Verne Betts

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the $$$. Only drawback is when mounting the amp in your saddlebags, and not getting very good FM reception. Which doesn't bother me since i listen to MP3's instead of the radio.
customer_reviews.author: M. W. Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: OMG
customer_reviews.text: I love my new radio the sound is great I just put new pipes on my Motorcycle that are very loud and with this new system I can hear my songs over the pipes.
customer_reviews.author: annamarie gunter

customer_reviews.title: Pyle PLMCA40 ROCKS
customer_reviews.text: I just installed my Pyle plmca40 motorcycle radio and i must say this thing rocks. The speakers sound great at about 9 on the volume when running around town, Then at 12 on the highway doing 70 no problems at all hearing the music. With this new radio I could ride my motorcycle for miles and miles.....Well done Pyle, if I were to do anything it would be an external antenna for better radio reception.
customer_reviews.author: David Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: pyle speakers for motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: They are nice looking the mounting clamps were not made for a motorcycle the speakers sound good sitting still but you have to turn them up going down the highway.it makes them sound like they're gona bust would not recommend if you are a harley owner break down and pay for the harley speakers
customer_reviews.author: stateman 01

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I hooked up this unit to my Harley Davidson. Looks great sound great. Easy installation. Driving on the highway between 55 and 70 mph, no problem hearing my music.
customer_reviews.author: BOBD

customer_reviews.title: not as described
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT 300 WATT, IT IS ONLY 100 WATT TOTAL 50 WATT X 2. ALSO IT DOES NOT HAVE A CLOCK, BASS CONTROL , OR TREBLE CONTROL. THE REMOTE WILL ONLY TURN OFF , DOES NOT TURN ON. THE REMOTE IS VERY TOUCHY WHEN YOU TRY TO RAISE OR LOWER THE VOLUME , YOU CHANGE RADIO STATIONS OR SWITCH SONGS IF PLAYING SONGS FROM SD CARD. IT SOUNDS OK, BUT YOU NEED THE 300 WATTS WHEN YOU ARE RIDING. YOU GET TO MUCH DISTORTION BECUASE YOU HAVE TO TURN VOLUME ALL THE WAY UP
customer_reviews.author: rocker8

customer_reviews.title: Marginal performance.
customer_reviews.text: SD card slot did not hold the card out of the box. Pyle customer service insisted the unit be sent back. Not worth it living in Sicily, Italy. Will live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item without opening it, and was charged nearly $25 restocking fee. It must be difficult for an employee to put this back on a shelf. I will never deal with this company again. Cheapskates!!!!! Don't bother with Pyle anyway, I have 5 friends who have this junk and they do nothing but complain it only works for 1 bike season, and then the amp goes. I was going to try it and after all of their complaints decided to send it back. It's garbage and their customer service sucks!
customer_reviews.author: my music

customer_reviews.title: A Good Choice For ATV/UTV
customer_reviews.text: I Installed this radio on a Polaris ranger. Installation was fairly easy. The FM radio receives stations that are 60 miles away. Sound and volumn are good.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Yingst

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad...But one flaw
customer_reviews.text: Unless my unit is not working properly, when using an MP3 player I have to adjust the volume on the player as the volume does not change by adjusting the units volume. It works really good with SD card, but I wish you could skip folders not just songs. For the size of this unit it is perfect for golf carts and similar uses. Plenty of power, but it does not take much as there is no engine noise to compete with. Love the wireless remote, nice for hitting mute when needed. We had to make our own mounting brackets as the provided brackets are made just for round such as handlebars of a bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome system
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Harley Sportster. Easy to install. Set the volume at around 22 & I can hear it @ 75mph, with the Windshield on. Mounted the Amp right on the Handlebar using an iPod Handlebar Bracket so I can just unplug it and throw it in my Saddlebag when I park the bike. Worth the $88 I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ranger

customer_reviews.title: LITTLE ROUGH AROUND THE EDGES
customer_reviews.text: I RECIEVED MY PYLE PLMCA40 LAST NIGHT AND INSTALLED IT ON MY HARLEY. FIRST SPEAKER I GRABBED THE NUT ON THE MOUNTING BARCKET WAS CROSS THREADED ON. WHILE TRYING TO GET THAT OFF, IT BROKE THE MOUNTING ROD OFF, THE HARDWARE IS MADE SUPER CHEAP AND ITS JUST REALLY JUNK. SPEAKERS SOUND GREAT AND ARE VERY LOUD! I WILL NOT BUY ANOTHER SET, DUE TO CRAPPY HARDWARE AND CHEAP METAL. ALTHOUGH THE SPEAKERS LOOK GREAT ON MY BIKE.
customer_reviews.author: Grayson

product_meta.title: Pyle Motorcycle Speaker and Amplifier System - 100 Watt Weatherproof w/Two 3" Waterproof Speakers, AUX in - Handlebar Mount ATV Mini Stereo Audio Receiver Kit Set - Also for Marine, Boat - PLMCA40
product_meta.description:
Pyle Model : PLMCA40

WEATHERPROOF SPEAKER & AMPLIFIER SYSTEM
100 WATT WEATHERPROOF SPEAKER AND AMPLIFIER SYSTEM, WITH DUAL 3'' SPEAKERS, USB/SD CARD READERS, AUX (3.5MM) INPUT, HANDLEBAR MOUNT, FM RADIO (FOR MOTORCYCLE, ATV, SNOWMOBILE, SCOOTER, BOAT, WAVERUNNER, JETSKI, ETC.)
System Features:System Includes (2) 3'' Weatherproof Speakers & Mini AmpMarine Grade Construction Dual SpeakersHandlebar Mount Speaker AssemblyRugged Chrome Bullet-Style Designed HousingUSB Flash Drive & SD Memory Card ReadersAux Input (3.5mm) Stereo Input Connector Jack(For iPod, MP3 Players, iPhones, Smartphones, Tablets, etc.) FM Radio with Auto-Scan Station Tuning SystemDigital LCD Dot Matrix DisplayEasy Touch Button ControlsSpeakers Connect to Amp via RCA Connector JacksDC Input Jack (12V DC Power Cable Included)Includes All Necessary Installation Cables, Wiring, Mounting Brackets and Hardware Wireless Mini Remote Control Included Mini Amp Suitable for 12 Volt Vehicles(Motorcycle, ATV, Scooter, Boat, Snowmobile, Waverunner, etc.)
Technical Specs100 Watt Max System Power Output50 Watt × 2 @ 2 Ohm 10% T.H.D.25 Watt x 2 @ 4 Ohm 10% T.H.D.Supports USB Flash Drives 2.0Supports SD Cards up to 4GBMP3 Digital File Format CompatibilityFM Coverage : 87.5-108.0MHzFrequency Response 20Hz-20kHzFM Sensitivity: 10uV @ S/N 30dBChannel Balance:<2dBS/N: >50dBAmp Dimensions (H x W x D): 5.2'' x 3.15'' x 1.86''Speaker Dimensions (H x W x D): 4.8'' x 4.13'' x 4.13''
The Pyle PLMCA40 Cycle Series Weatherproof Speaker and Amplifier System gives your vehicle versatile sound power on the go. Mount the dual 3'' marine grade construction speakers to your handlebars and cruise around with style. The chrome bullet-designed speakers can mount to a motorcycle, ATV, snowmobile or waverunner to provide mobile audio on the move. The system includes (2) 50 watt weatherproof speakers, mini amplifier and all the necessary mounting hardware and cables to get connected. Amplifier features include LCD dot matrix display, FM radio, Aux input (3.5mm) connector jack (that connects to external devices like iPods, MP3 Players, iPhones, Smartphones, tablets, etc.). The amplifier also features USB Flash and SD Memory card readers so you can listen to your digital music files instantly. Included remote control unit allows for easy and wireless operation and control. Now you can enjoy mobile music on the go with Pyle's Cycle Series Weatherproof Speaker and Amplifier Systems.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER




The PLMCA40 includes a 100W amplifier, 3" weatherproof mountable speakers, a wireless remote control unit, and mounting accessories Click here for a larger image The amplifier includes a 3.5mm male-to-male cord to connect any digital music player -- works with iPod, iPhone, Android, and BlackBerry: larger image. 

Wiring diagram: click here for a larger image.

WEATHERPROOF AUDIO SYSTEM PERFECT FOR YOUR MOTORCYCLE, ATV, OR SNOWMOBILE
This weatherproof speaker system is what you need to listen to high-quality auto on your motorcycle, ATV, or snowmobile! Just mount the two 3” 50-watt weatherproof speakers and the amplifier equipped with a dot matrix LCD display showing FM frequency and clock to your vehicle. Listen to FM stations or plug your MP3 player or iPod into the included 3.5mm jack to listen to your favorite music on this stylish system. Or load an SD card or USB stick with music and plug it in.

WEATHERPROOF SPEAKERS WITH A TOUCH OF CHROME
With the PLMCA40, your vehicle won't just sound great — it'll look great, too, thanks to the unique bullet design of the two included three-inch speakers. These speakers are also finished in chrome for a look that will compliment your vehicle. The speakers connect easily to the amplifier/base unit.

WORKS WITH IPOD, IPHONE, ANDROID, OR ANY MP3 PLAYER
The amplifier/base unit is equipped with a 3.5mm (1/8") jack for connection to your MP3 or CD player, so you can listen your favorite music using your own devices.

USB INPUT & SD CARD SLOT
Expand your music capabilities with the USB input port and SD card slot. Just plug in a USB stick or SD card loaded with MP3s and start playing! Supports SD cards up to 4 GB.

WIRELESS REMOTE CONTROL
Sometimes you want to crank up the volume while you're moving on the road. The PLMCA40 includes a wireless remote control with play/pause, volume up, volume down, and mute buttons. It attaches to your keychain, so you'll always know where it is.

WORKS WITH A VARIETY OF OUTDOOR VEHICLES
The PLMCA40 isn't just for motorcycles: it works great with snowmobiles, ATVs, scooters, boats, waverunners — any recreational vehicle! Get some great sound wherever you are, on any vehicle.

EASY TO MOUNT & INSTALL
The PLMCA40 includes mounting brackets, accessories, and detailed instructions for easy installation. The chrome bullet speakers are equipped with built-in mounting clamps and easily attach to your vehicle's handlebars.

SUPPORTS VARIOUS DEVICES: The amplifier base unit lets you connect MP3, CD player, iPod, iPhone, Smartphone, tablet to the 3.5mm AUX IN. Features FM Radio, clock display through the LCD screen. Supports SD card up to 4 GB and USB sticks
